name: 777Bullets
description:
It's time for a funky night !

You're working for the 777 Bullets Agency. Your goal ? Kill the bad guys.

  • ZQSD / WASD to MOVE ! 
  • Space to JUMP ! 
  • Left Ctrl to Slide !
  •  Left Click to SHOOT WITH YOUR PINK SHOTGUN ! 
  • Right Click to SHOOT WITH YOUR BLUE SHOTGUN !

Don't lose the rhythm!

▀▄▀▄▀▄⭐▄▀▄▀▄▀

▀▄▀▄▀▄⭐▄▀▄▀▄▀

777bullets is a game made in two months by four students from e-artsup Paris in second year of Game-Art and Creative-Coding

Creative Codings :

Andy REMY (Programming, UI/UX, Character Animation)

Ewen LE MOAL (Level Design, Game Design, music, voice acting)

Game Artists :

Andrea DI MARZIO (2D artist, 3D artist, sound designer)

Laura BETTINI (2D artist, 3D artist, voice acting)

▀▄▀▄▀▄ ⭐ ▄▀▄▀▄▀

Musics and voices are made by us and all SFX are Royalty Free
